GOD.content: has Christianity alone made possible an authentic responsibility, responsibility as history, and as history of Europe? there’s no choice here btwn a logical deduction & reference to the revelatory event [not simply affirmed as believer]

OOG.content: Europe is the good example of historicity, incarnating in its purity the Telos of all historicity: universality, omnitemporality, infinite traditonality

FL.content: we adult white male Europeans, carnivorous and capable of sacrifice

SPOM.content: haunting marks the very existence of Europe

POOF.content: once again referring to the ‘infinite’ Christianization of Greek fraternity, while reminding us that Greek phília carries w/in it the injunction of its infinitization, Derrida will privilege Christianiziation for the role it played in the theological-political graft that constructed political discourse of modern Europe

OH.content: is Europe an example or exemplary?
OH.linkedContent: is Europe an example or exemplary?

OH.content: we must not forget programs that do not forget us [re: Eurocentrism, anti-Eurocentrism]
OH.linkedContent: we must not forget programs that do not forget us [re: Eurocentrism, anti-Eurocentrism]

OH.content: responsibility for the other heading—European?
OH.linkedContent: responsibility for the other heading—European?

OH.content: Europe: representation or figure of a universal idea; has confused its face, figure, w/ a point, a phallus; the idea of an advanced point of exemplarity is the idea of the European idea, eidos, archē, telos, the idea of beginning, commanding, cap, captain, towards an accomplished end

OH.content: advanced point is at once beginning and end, divided as beginning and end (Heidegger on Ort as point of spear, and fromm, Frömmigkeit, from promos, what leads, l’avant-garde)
OH.linkedContent: advanced point is at once beginning and end, divided as beginning and end (Heidegger on Ort as point of spear, and fromm, Frömmigkeit, from promos, what leads, l’avant-garde)

OH.content: Europe gathers difference into itself, is difference w/ itself
OH.linkedContent: Europe gathers difference into itself, is difference w/ itself

OH.content: horizon (ancient Greek) = limit; to see itself (Europe) on the horizon, is to see itself from its end, discourse of anamnesis—taste for finality (goût de fin), for death

OH.content: from Valéry, Europe name of that which leads subject to desiring maximum (capital, power)

OH.content: Europe: paleonymic appellation
OH.linkedContent: Europe: paleonymic appellation

OH.content: there is a crisis whenever the capital of infinity and universality finds itself in danger, when the eidos, limits, ends, confines, the finitude of Europe, emerges

OH.content: Heidegger’s Entmachtung of spirit > destitution of Europe

OH.content: double injunction of Europe: 1) cannot be dispersed (monopoly) 2) remote control [TV] (dispersion)

OH.content: double bind of European cultural identity: 1) necessary not to reconstitute centralizing hegemony (the capital) 2) necessary not to cultivate minority differences for their sake, untranslatable idiolects (not to multiply borders, marges, marches)

OH.content: Europe advances itself as heading for universal essence of man > to advance oneself: to name oneself, rush out ahead, in front, anticipate, launch, stick one’s neck out, to love or to violate, to love to violate, to colonize, colonize itself

OH.content: Valéry: Mediterranean has been a veritable machine for making culture

OH.content: for Husserl, the European philosopher committed to universal reason is functionary of mankind

OH.content: the duty to respond to call of European memory, all other duties presuppose this one in silence [?]

OH.content: this same duty dictates welcoming foreigners, cultivating virtue of critical idea, but also submitting critique to deconstructive genealogy that exceeds it w/out compromising it, dictates a democracy to come (not even a regulative Kantian idea), tolerance of faith, minorities

FWT.content: Europe arms itself and those against it w/ weapons against it—auto-immunization
FWT.linkedContent: Europe arms itself and those against it w/ weapons against it—auto-immunization

FWT.content: the universal of philosophy (neither relativism nor nationalism) not a given, an essence, but an infinite process of universalization > in the name of European filiation we are liberating ourselves from Eurocentrism/ethnocentrism
